name: User Login
description: As a user, I want to login to the application so that I can access my dashboard

background.text: I am on the login page

steps.text: I enter "user@example.com" in the email field
I enter "password123" in the password field
I click the login button
I should see the dashboard page
I should see a welcome message

scenarios.name: Successful login with remember me option

steps.text: I enter "user@example.com" in the email field
I enter "password123" in the password field
I click on the remember me checkbox
I click the login button
I should see the dashboard page
the remember me preference should be saved

scenarios.name: Login fails with invalid email format

steps.text: I enter "invalidemailformat" in the email field
I enter "password123" in the password field
I click the login button
I should see an error message "Please enter a valid email address"
I should remain on the login page

scenarios.name: Login fails with password less than 8 characters

steps.text: I enter "user@example.com" in the email field
I enter "short" in the password field
I click the login button
I should see an error message "Password must be at least 8 characters"
I should remain on the login page
I enter "user@example.com" in the email field
I enter "wrongpassword" in the password field
I click the login button
I should see an error message "Invalid email or password"
I should remain on the login page

scenarios.name: Login fails with empty email field

steps.text: I leave the email field empty
I enter "password123" in the password field
I click the login button
I should see an error message "Email is required"
I should remain on the login page

scenarios.name: Login fails with empty password field

steps.text: I enter "user@example.com" in the email field
I leave the password field empty
I click the login button
I should see an error message "Password is required"
I should remain on the login page

scenarios.name: Remember me checkbox is available and functional

steps.text: the remember me checkbox should be visible
I click on the remember me checkbox
the remember me checkbox should be checked
I click on the remember me checkbox again
the remember me checkbox should be unchecked
I enter "user@example.com'; DROP TABLE users; --" in the email field
I enter "password123" in the password field
I click the login button
I should see an error message "Invalid email or password"
I should remain on the login page
the application should not be compromised

Feature: User Login
  As a user, I want to login to the application so that I can access my dashboard

  Background:
    StepKeyword.GIVEN I am on the login page
    StepKeyword.AND the login form is displayed

  @smoke @login @happy-path
  Scenario: Successful login with valid credentials
    StepKeyword.WHEN I enter "user@example.com" in the email field
    StepKeyword.AND I enter "password123" in the password field
    StepKeyword.AND I click the login button
    StepKeyword.THEN I should see the dashboard page
    StepKeyword.AND I should see a welcome message

  @smoke @login @happy-path
  Scenario: Successful login with remember me option
    StepKeyword.WHEN I enter "user@example.com" in the email field
    StepKeyword.AND I enter "password123" in the password field
    StepKeyword.AND I click on the remember me checkbox
    StepKeyword.AND I click the login button
    StepKeyword.THEN I should see the dashboard page
    StepKeyword.AND the remember me preference should be saved

  @negative @login @validation
  Scenario: Login fails with invalid email format
    StepKeyword.WHEN I enter "invalidemailformat" in the email field
    StepKeyword.AND I enter "password123" in the password field
    StepKeyword.AND I click the login button
    StepKeyword.THEN I should see an error message "Please enter a valid email address"
    StepKeyword.AND I should remain on the login page

  @negative @login @validation
  Scenario: Login fails with password less than 8 characters
    StepKeyword.WHEN I enter "user@example.com" in the email field
    StepKeyword.AND I enter "short" in the password field
    StepKeyword.AND I click the login button
    StepKeyword.THEN I should see an error message "Password must be at least 8 characters"
    StepKeyword.AND I should remain on the login page

  @negative @login @error-handling
  Scenario: Login fails with incorrect credentials
    StepKeyword.WHEN I enter "user@example.com" in the email field
    StepKeyword.AND I enter "wrongpassword" in the password field
    StepKeyword.AND I click the login button
    StepKeyword.THEN I should see an error message "Invalid email or password"
    StepKeyword.AND I should remain on the login page

  @negative @login @edge-case
  Scenario: Login fails with empty email field
    StepKeyword.WHEN I leave the email field empty
    StepKeyword.AND I enter "password123" in the password field
    StepKeyword.AND I click the login button
    StepKeyword.THEN I should see an error message "Email is required"
    StepKeyword.AND I should remain on the login page

  @negative @login @edge-case
  Scenario: Login fails with empty password field
    StepKeyword.WHEN I enter "user@example.com" in the email field
    StepKeyword.AND I leave the password field empty
    StepKeyword.AND I click the login button
    StepKeyword.THEN I should see an error message "Password is required"
    StepKeyword.AND I should remain on the login page

  @ui @login
  Scenario: Remember me checkbox is available and functional
    StepKeyword.THEN the remember me checkbox should be visible
    StepKeyword.WHEN I click on the remember me checkbox
    StepKeyword.THEN the remember me checkbox should be checked
    StepKeyword.WHEN I click on the remember me checkbox again
    StepKeyword.THEN the remember me checkbox should be unchecked

  @security @login @negative
  Scenario: Login with SQL injection attempt
    StepKeyword.WHEN I enter "user@example.com'; DROP TABLE users; --" in the email field
    StepKeyword.AND I enter "password123" in the password field
    StepKeyword.AND I click the login button
    StepKeyword.THEN I should see an error message "Invalid email or password"
    StepKeyword.AND I should remain on the login page
    StepKeyword.AND the application should not be compromised
